title: The Midnight Land: Part Two: The Gift
description: “What…what curse?” Slava asked… Having escaped from spirits, bandits, and the hardships of the Midnight Land, Slava finds herself embroiled in even more intrigue than before. But while she struggles to discover the truth and make her companions see reason, the gods themselves make her an offer she may not be able to refuse. The only question is, will it turn out to be a gift, or a curse? Is it her fate to become a victim, or a hero?
author: E.P. Clark
